mapper.select: SELECT uf.user_id as user_friend_id, u.user_profile_photo AS user_friend_profile_photo, u.user_name AS user_friend_name, uf.user_note AS friend_note FROM user_friends uf JOIN user u ON uf.user_friend_id = u.user_id WHERE uf.user_id=#{userId}
SELECT * FROM user_friends WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND user_friend_id=#{friendId}
mapper.update: UPDATE user_friends SET user_note=#{userFriendNoteName} WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND user_friend_id=#{friendId}
